description: JSON schema for a quantify sequencer operation.

unitary.description: A unitary matrix describing the operation.

qubits.description: A list of strings indicating the qubits the gate acts on. Valid qubits are strings that appear in the device_config.json file.

plot_func.description: reference to a function for plotting this operation. If not specified, defaults to using :func:`quantify.scheduler.visualization.circuit_diagram.gate_box`.

pulse_info.description: A list containing the pulses that are part of the operation

items.description: Info to generate an individual pulse.

port.description: A string specifying the port used by the pulse.

clock.description: A string specifying the clock used to modulate the pulse.

wf_func.description: reference to a function to generate the pulse of this operation.

t0.description: Starting time of the pulse with respect to the start of the operation in seconds.

duration.description: The duration of the pulse in seconds.
